Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Project: The main research is on the impact of climate change on agricultural production, and the impact of temperature, precipitation and extreme climate events on crop yields. We will use climate data from public datasets and Han Tang Cloud's cloud computing and big data processing capabilities to establish accurate prediction models, provide scientific basis for agricultural management and policy making, and strive to provide technical support for the national East-West computing strategy. Understanding the specific impact of climate change on agriculture can help formulate effective response strategies. We hope to promote the development of sustainable agriculture through this project, combined with distributed storage and big data technology.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Download public data using NASA's Atmospheric Science Data Center, an archive of NASA satellite and model data related to atmospheric chemistry, atmospheric dynamics, precipitation, hydrology, solar irradiance, weather, and climate.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We have our own storage facility. The data is based on NASA open source big data warehouse. After downloading, use filedrive-team's open source go-graphsplit to cut it into piece files of specified size. The csv file will store the piece_cid and size information corresponding to the source file. We will also use but not limited to Droplet and other tools.
